questions.text: What is the primary goal of the Situational Awareness (SA) domain?
options: To analyze information for operational stability and security
questions.correctAnswer: To analyze information for operational stability and security

questions.text: Which practice is part of the Lifecycle goal in the Configuration and Change Management(CCM) domain?
options: Testing asset modifications before committing to production

questions.text: Which of the following is a practice under the Configuration and Change Management (CCM) domain?
options: Establishing a baseline of network operations
Implementing access control measures for critical systems
questions.correctAnswer: Establishing a baseline of network operations

questions.text: What is the focus of the Training and Awareness (TA) domain?
options: Promoting awareness and skills for critical service roles
questions.correctAnswer: Promoting awareness and skills for critical service roles

questions.text: Which maturity level (MIL) indicates that practices are periodically evaluated?
What is the primary purpose of the Asset Categorization process in Controls Management(CM)?
options: To establish guidelines for critical service protection
To identify risks associated with external dependencies
To monitor external threats to the organization
To categorize information assets based on sensitivity and impact
questions.correctAnswer: To categorize information assets based on sensitivity and impact

questions.text: In the Vulnerability Management (VM) domain, what is the first step to managing vulnerabilities?
Which domain is responsible for ensuring that resilience requirements are integrated into external agreements?
In Service Continuity Management (SCM), what is the purpose of testing continuity plans?
options: To validate the effectiveness of the plans
questions.correctAnswer: To validate the effectiveness of the plans

questions.text: What is a key objective of the Risk Management (RM) domain in CRR?
options: To categorize information based on security level
To analyze and mitigate risks to critical service assets
questions.correctAnswer: To analyze and mitigate risks to critical service assets
